law.text: Every licensed fur processor shall, within fifteen (15) days after January 1 and July 1 of each year file with the department an inventory of furs in his possession as of such dates. Every licensed fur processor shall also issue receipts for the total number of furs purchased from fur buyers, each of which shall show the license number of the fur buyer from whom purchased. Duplicates of such receipts shall be sent to the department with the inventory report.
law.history: Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 59, effective June 19, 1952. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 21.
